sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Employee Blood and Organ Donation Leave Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Employee Blood and Organ Donation Leave Act.

sections.heading: Purpose. This Act is intended to provide time off with pay to allow employees of units of local government, boards of election commissioners, or private employers in the State of Illinois to donate blood or an organ
